channel.title: My buddys having some problems
channel.description:
Hello, First, i want to say thanks for taking your time to read this, well here we go.
my buddy is trying to run silabsoft client, when he gets this error when running the batch file that runs the client, could anyone help us? Been stuck on it for days, he has JDK installed, he has latest java and everything.. i cant think of any other problems.. heres a picture of what is wrong----
[img]http://www.chocoscape.com/07 Sep 30 - 12.24.01.png[/img]

item.title: My buddys having some problems
item.dc:creator: @Unid_H4x0r Unid H4x0r
item.description:
@Unid_H4x0r wrote:

or this?

"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin\java" -cp . -Xmx500m pause

Read full topic

item.title: My buddys having some problems
item.dc:creator: @VorargC VorargC
item.description:
@VorargC wrote:

Right click run.bat and click edit.

"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin\java" -cp . -Xmx500m -jar client.jar 0 0 highmem members 0 pause

Have him try that. If he has jdk 6u1.
If he has JDK 6u2, replace the last 1 with a 2.

Read full topic
